name: Geo Stelar & Omega-Xis (Mega)
description:
The protagonists of the journey. 
 
Geo is a fifth-grader who dreams of becoming an astronaut like his father, but swore to never go to school again after his father was lost at space. 

 A mysterious device sparks his encounter with Omega-Xis.

name: Mega Man
description:
The fusion of Geo and Omega-Xis made of EM waves. 
 
This form allows Mega Man to explore the Wave World.

name: Sonia Strum
description:
A musician whose melodies light up the hearts of her massive teenage fan base. 

 Sonia's outward appearance as a shining star of joy hides a grief-stricken heart aching from the tragic loss of her mother.

name: Luna Platz
description:
Class president and queen bee of Geo and his classmates. 
 
Luna's bossy attitude belies her caring of those around her. 

 Her heart can't help but flutter at the thought of Mega Man.

name: Bud Bison
description:
A classmate of Geo who is eager to fulfill the needs of both his friends and his stomach.
 
 No obstacle is a match for Bud's bullish spirit when his favorite dish—ginger beef—is on the line.
